message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly benefit your business. Given its high quality and unique features, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your operations. To make this opportunity accessible, I propose an initial price of $12000. This includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive setup package and a year of free maintenance. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or if you have any questions.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the comprehensive setup package and free maintenance you're including. However, I'm looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Could we perhaps negotiate the price down to $10000? I'm very interested in your product and believe it could be beneficial for my needs.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your concerns regarding the budget, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of this, I am proposing a revised offer of $11000 for the product. This price includes the comprehensive setup package and a year of free maintenance, which I believe offers excellent value. I hope this proposal better aligns with your financial considerations while still providing you with access to our premium product. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if there's anything else I can assist you with.
